00042 REAL sqr( REAL x )
00043 {
00044     return x * x;
00045 }
00046 
00047 REAL Log10( REAL x )
00048 {
00049     return log10( x + BITSY );
00050 }
00051 
00052 REAL Log10P( REAL x )
00053 {
00054     return +10.0f * log10( x + BITSY );
00055 }
00056 
00057 REAL Log10Q( REAL x )
00058 {
00059     return -10.0f * log10( x + BITSY );
00060 }
00061 
00062 REAL dBP( REAL x )
00063 {
00064     return 20.0f * log10( x + BITSY );
00065 }
00066 
00067 REAL DamPlus( REAL x0, REAL x1 )
00068 {
00069     return 0.9995f * x0 + 0.0005 * x1;
00070 }

00072 int popcnt( int k )
00073 {
00074     int c,
00075         i;
00076 
00077     c = k & 01;
00078     for ( i = 1; i < 32; i++ )
00079         c += ( k >> i ) & 01;
00080     return c;
00081 }
00082 
00083 int npoof2( int n )
00084 {
00085     int i = 0;
00086 
00087     --n;
00088     while ( n > 0 )
00089         n >>= 1, i++;
00090     return i;
00091 }
00092 
00093 int nblock2( int n )
00094 {
00095     return 1 << npoof2( n );
00096 }
00097 
00098 int in_blocks( int count, int block_size )
00099 {
00100     if ( block_size < 1 )
00101     {
00102         fprintf( stderr, "block_size zero in in_blocks\n" );
00103         exit( 1 );
00104     }
00105     return ( 1 + ( ( count - 1 ) / block_size ) );
00106 }

00108 FILE *efopen( char *path, char *mode )
00109 {
00110     FILE *iop = fopen( path, mode );
00111 
00112     if ( !iop )
00113     {
00114         fprintf( stderr, "can't open \"%s\" in mode \"%s\"\n", path, mode );
00115         exit( 1 );
00116     }
00117     return iop;
00118 }
00119 
00120 FILE *efreopen( char *path, char *mode, FILE * strm )
00121 {
00122     FILE *iop = freopen( path, mode, strm );
00123 
00124     if ( !iop )
00125     {
00126         fprintf( stderr, "can't reopen \"%s\" in mode \"%s\"\n", path, mode );
00127         exit( 1 );
00128     }
00129     return iop;
00130 }

00132 size_t filesize( char *path )
00133 {
00134     struct stat sbuf;
00135 
00136     if ( stat( path, &sbuf ) == -1 )
00137         return -1;
00138     return sbuf.st_size;
00139 }
00140 
00141 size_t fdsize( int fd )
00142 {
00143     struct stat sbuf;
00144 
00145     if ( fstat( fd, &sbuf ) == -1 )
00146         return -1;
00147     return sbuf.st_size;
00148 }
00149 
00150 #define MILLION (1000000)
00151 
00152 // return current tv
00153 struct timeval now_tv( void )
00154 {
00155     struct timeval tv;
00156 
00157     gettimeofday( &tv, 0 );
00158     return tv;
00159 }
00160 
00161 // return ta - tb
00162 struct timeval diff_tv( struct timeval *ta, struct timeval *tb )
00163 {
00164     struct timeval tv;
00165 
00166     if ( tb->tv_usec > ta->tv_usec )
00167     {
00168         ta->tv_sec--;
00169         ta->tv_usec += MILLION;
00170     }
00171     tv.tv_sec = ta->tv_sec - tb->tv_sec;
00172     if ( ( tv.tv_usec = ta->tv_usec - tb->tv_usec ) >= MILLION )
00173     {
00174         tv.tv_usec -= MILLION;
00175         tv.tv_sec++;
00176     }
00177     return tv;
00178 }
00179 
00180 // return ta + tb
00181 struct timeval sum_tv( struct timeval *ta, struct timeval *tb )
00182 {
00183     struct timeval tv;
00184 
00185     tv.tv_sec = ta->tv_sec + tb->tv_sec;
00186     if ( ( tv.tv_usec = ta->tv_usec + tb->tv_usec ) >= MILLION )
00187     {
00188         tv.tv_usec -= MILLION;
00189         tv.tv_sec++;
00190     }
00191     return tv;
00192 }
00193 
00194 char *fmt_tv( struct timeval *tv )
00195 {
00196     static char buff[256];
00197 
00198     snprintf( buff, sizeof( buff ), "%ds%du", tv->tv_sec, tv->tv_usec );
00199     return buff;
00200 }
00201 
00202 char *since( struct timeval *tv )
00203 {
00204     struct timeval nt = now_tv(  ),
00205         dt = diff_tv( &nt, tv );
00206 
00207     return fmt_tv( &dt );
00208 }

00211 // @brief linear integer interpolation
00212 // @param u Real vector of length \a m
00213 // @param m Length of vector \a u, \a m must divide \a n
00214 // @param v Real vector of length \a n
00215 // @param n Length of vector \a v, \a m must divide \a n
00216 // @return actual number of valid points in \a u (== n - m/n since v[n] is undefined)
00217 int hinterp_vec( REAL * u, int m, REAL * v, int n )
00218 {
00219     if ( !u || !v || ( n < 2 ) || ( m < n ) || ( m % n ) )
00220         return 0;
00221     else
00222     {
00223         int div = m / n,
00224             i,
00225             j = 0;
00226 
00227         for ( i = 1; i < n; i++ )
00228         {
00229             int k;
00230             REAL vl = v[i - 1],
00231                 del = ( v[i] - vl ) / div;
00232 
00233             u[j++] = vl;
00234             for ( k = 1; k < div; k++ )
00235                 u[j++] = vl + k * del;
00236         }
00237         u[j++] = v[n - 1];
00238         return j;
00239     }
00240 }

00242 void status_message( char *msg )
00243 {
00244     write( 2, msg, strlen( msg ) );
00245 }

00247 FILE *find_rcfile( char *base )
00248 {
00249     char path[MAXPATHLEN];
00250     FILE *fp;
00251 
00252     sprintf( path, "./%s", base );
00253     if ( ( fp = fopen( path, "r" ) ) )
00254         return fp;
00255     else
00256     {
00257         char *home = getenv( "HOME" );
00258 
00259         if ( !home )
00260             fprintf( stderr, "can't get HOME!\n" ), exit( 1 );
00261         sprintf( path, "%s/%s", home, base );
00262         if ( ( fp = fopen( path, "r" ) ) )
00263             return fp;
00264     }
00265     return 0;
00266 }

00270 unsigned long hash( unsigned char *str )
00271 {
00272     unsigned long hash = 5381;
00273     int c;
00274 
00275     while ( c = *str++ )
00276         hash = ( ( hash << 5 ) + hash ) + c;    // (hash * 33 + c) better
00277     return hash;
00278 }

00280 int gcd( int m, int n )
00281 {
00282     return ( m % n == 0 ? n : gcd( n, m % n ) );
00283 }
00284 
00285 int least_common_mul( int i, int j )
00286 {
00287     return ( abs( ( i * j ) / gcd( i, j ) ) );
00288 }
